markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[I Meant to Do That](/Feats.aspx?ID=3278) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 143</row>

**Archetype** [Unexpected Sharpshooter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=123)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3272); Trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Requirements**
Your previous action was a ranged weapon Strike that missed a foe within 60 feet.

</column>

---

Somehow your stray bullet causes an unintended reaction that creates a problem for your enemy: perhaps a ricochet knocks your foe's weapon away or they stumble over stray debris in an attempt to dodge your bullets. Roll a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), or [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the foe you missed.
name: I Meant to Do That
prerequisite: Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication; Trained in Deception
requirement: Your previous action was a ranged weapon Strike that missed a foe within 60 feet.
requirement_markdown: Your previous action was a ranged weapon Strike that missed a foe within 60 feet.
